revised_title: Experiments with Lime-Water and the Lithotriptic Power of Carlsbad Waters
tldr: The author discusses experiments conducted with lime-water and the Carlsbad waters to dissolve urinary stones. They compare the effectiveness of these treatments and analyze the factors that may affect their lithotriptic power. Additionally, the author shares a case study of a patient with a paralytic disorder who experienced improvement after consuming Carlsbad waters.
